title: PERSEPOLIS title font
content:
Can someone help me identify the logo font for this movie?

 [‹ Help Identifying San Serif Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119081338/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47312 "Go to previous forum topic") [Daily Kos ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119081338/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47335 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dontbugme

comments.content: WhatTheFont suggests [Eagle Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119081338/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/ateagle-bold/), which looks like a match.
